Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2018 09:18AM Noble13 wrote: I just had a full duct excision on 3/14 and waiting for pathology...This has been a rollercoaster of procedures, waiting for results, procedure, waiting for results...but this is the big one. Everything hinges on these results. I never knew I had super dense “busy” breasts before January! I’ve had I don’t know how many mammograms, a ductogram that ended with a titanium clip being put next to the most concerning area, two MRIs w/contrasts...the wire guide insertion and then the full duct excision. This waiting is the hardest...they said 5-7 business days...otherwise known as FOREVEr!! These boards have been a life saver! I am sending good thoughts f
Posts.Title: Ductal Excision results Lalalovestoread Noble13
